Subjects: mutability; transitoriness, of world; Fortune, fickleness of
_description: Warning to those in high estate that their fortune is temporary — one quatrain plus refrain(?)

HarLaw58.Transcription:
Somtyme I have you senein high estate full strangewhan fantasy
                    made you wenethat fourtune wold not chaungenot chaunge not
                    chaunge
HarLaw58.Editions:
Voigts,  Linda Ehrsam. 
             “A Handlist of Middle English in Harvard Manuscripts.” 
             Harvard Library Bulletin
         33 (1985): 1-96: 82.
